Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.utils

Class FileUtility

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.utils.FileUtility
public class FileUtility extends Object
Utility class providing static methods for file handling operations.

    • createNewFile

      public static boolean createNewFile(String filePath, String rootPath) throws IOException
      Creates a new file at the specified path, ensuring the directory exists.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The full path to the file to create.
      rootPath - The root directory to ensure exists.
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully created.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • writeToFile

      public static boolean writeToFile(String filePath, String content) throws IOException
      Writes content to a file at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      content - The content to write.
      Returns:
      true if the write operation was successful.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during writing.

    • countLines

      public static int countLines(String filePath) throws IOException
      Counts the number of lines in a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      Returns:
      The number of lines in the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during reading.

    • getLineFromFile

      public static String getLineFromFile(String filePath, int lineNumber) throws IOException
      Retrieves a specific line from a file by line number.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      lineNumber - The line number to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The content of the specified line or null if the line does not exist.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during reading.

    • clearFileContents

      public static void clearFileContents(String filePath) throws IOException
      Clears the contents of a file without deleting the file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during writing.
